quests.objective: [solo] Solo mode with adaptive escalation - DONE
quests.note: Implemented haiku→sonnet→opus escalation, comprehensive verification, feedback loop

quests.objective: [bug] Fix intel.txt parser - should skip Archive section and HTML comments
[bug] Surrender should clear inventory.json so status shows 'No active raid'
[bug] SDK cwd option not isolating agent file operations - agents write to process.cwd() not worktree
[solo] Track token usage in solo mode - log tokens per attempt for cost visibility
[solo] Add --dry-run flag to solo command - show complexity assessment without executing
[solo] Add spell check to verification - pnpm spell as optional verification step
[ux] Fix status flicker - atomic state file writes to prevent partial reads during watch
[portability] Add support for external repos - undercity should work on any repo, not just itself
[portability] Add 'undercity init' command to initialize .undercity/ and intel.txt in a new repo
[metrics] Log to .undercity/metrics.jsonl - queryable history of quest durations, token usage, model escalations
[metrics] Track success rate per complexity level - which tasks need escalation most?
[grind] Improve grind command - better quest selection, skip already-complete, priority ordering
[parallel] Add parallel solo mode - run multiple solo tasks on different branches concurrently
[tui] Build a TUI dashboard - combine status display and streaming logs in one view
[qol] Add config file support (.undercityrc) for default options like --stream, model choices
